name: 質性研究法
goals: 理解並陳述質性研究的意義、特徵與功能
理解質性研究設計的邏輯與各項方法
評析質性研究論文的品質
獨立完成一項質性的研究計畫案
syllabus:
_**Course Topics & Schedule (****by Week):**_

1.  **Introduction to the Course + What is Qualitative Research?** (9/23) (\* online lecture)
2.  **Research Philosophies and Methodologies (Ontology, Epistemology, Axiology and Methodologies) +** **Key Qualitative Approaches** \+ **The Qualitative Research Process (Research Questions/Research Objectives)** (9/30) (\* online lecture)
3.  **Literature Review + Critical Literature Review/Systematic Literature Review + Conceptual Framework** + **Designing a Qualitative Study** (10/7) (\* online lecture)
4.  **Focus Group + In-depth Interview + Participant Observation** + **Qualitative Data Analysis (Content Analysis, Thematic Analysis) + Qualitative Data Coding** (10/14)
5.  **Narrative Research\*\*\*** (10/21)
6.  **Phenomenology / Phenomenological Research \*\*\*** (10/28)
7.  **Grounded Theory**\*\*\* (11/4)
8.  **Ethnography**\*\*\* (11/11)
9.  **Case Study Research**\*\*\* (11/18)
10.  **Action Research**\*\*\* (11/25)
11.  **Qualitative Research Proposal Writing + Sampling Methods & Representativeness + Providing Feedback** (12/2)
12.  **Proposal Presentations\*\*\* + Providing Feedback** (12/9)
13.  **Trustworthiness of Findings + Triangulation** (12/16)
14.  **Qualitative Research Writing + Overcoming Barriers** (12/23)
15.  **Qualitative Research Ethical Considerations + Other Qualitative Methodologies** (12/30)
16.  **Research Project Presentations\*\*\*** (1/6)
17.  Week 17 – Revise Your Proposal
18.  Week 18 – Revise Your Proposal

grading.note: Mini-teaching Session of a Qualitative Methodology 30%

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
